text: Pas, suru' kard Jusuf ʙa koftukovi ʙorxaltahojason, pes az koftani ʙorxaltai ʙarodaras (Binjomin), ʙa'd az on dar oxir ʙarovard pajmonaro az ʙorxaltai ʙarodaras, hamcunin tadʙir omuxtem ʙaroi Jusuf, cunki Jusuf omoda naʙud, ki asir girad ʙarodari xudro dar dini podsohi Misr, lek ʙa vositai in tadʙir asir giriftan irodai xosi Alloh ʙud. Baland megardonem martaʙai har kasero, ki xohem va ʙoloi har sohiʙilm ʙoz donismande hast
